cause.description:
This cause is in honor of John Wong, who was recently injured severely in a gang fight. The violence is unneccessary and a poor representation of these people, who are generally ok to begin with. Please join so that we can help put an end to this horrible crime.
1. Violence leads to ruined lives
2. There are better ways to deal with issues
cause.mission: to put an end to unneccessary gang fighting
cause.name: Stop Gang Violence
